I think I have just the ticket for you! Have you considered "Mystic River"? It's a gripping detective mystery that explores the complex relationships between childhood friends and their connections to a tragic murder case. With an all-star cast, including Kevin Bacon and Sean Penn, this 2003 film is a must-see for any detective movie fan.

If you're looking for something a bit more action-packed, "Takers" might be up your alley! This high-octane thriller features a star-studded cast, including Matt Dillon and Hayden Christensen, as they take on the role of bank robbers.
